Note: 
This game contains multiple unlockable paths - don't stop playing at the first credits roll!

Thanks to your support, we've added a new DLC "EPISODE YAMATO"!
The main story has won multi-game awards and we highly recommend you to play this adventure game!
*You need to pay extra cost to play the DLC

Dive 300 years into the future of Tokyo. Altdeus: Beyond Chronos is a sci-fi adventure full of robot battles, pop music, and emotion. It features 15-20 hours of gameplay with one of the largest branching storylines ever in a VR game. 
Become Chloe, a mecha pilot who will have her revenge and annihilate the Meteora once and for all. Pilot a giant mecha and make the decisions to determine humanity’s future. Explore new choices to uncover new branches of the story and discover all of ALTDEUS’ endings!

Discover the truth, destroy the enemy, and enjoy the cyberspace pop concerts!

nodes.title: Check out the latest trailer of our new DLC, ALTDEUS: Beyond Chronos EPISODE YAMATO
nodes.body_text:
Hello, this is the MyDearest team.

We’ve released our new DLC, ALTDEUS: Beyond Chronos EPISODE YAMATO and we hope you’re enjoying the brand new story.

As you might notice, we’ve uploaded the latest trailer on our official YouTube channel, Chronos Series Channel along with the DLC release.
The trailer includes the theme song “MEDDLER” by a Japanese singer Suzuki Konomi.

Please check it out if you haven’t watched it yet.

We’re also looking forward to hearing your impression of the DLC on the review page.

Best regards,

The MyDearest Team

nodes.title: DLC ALTDEUS: Beyond Chronos EPISODE YAMATO is out now!
nodes.body_text:
Hello, this is the MyDearest team.

We’re pleased to announce that a new DLC of ALTDEUS: Beyond Chronos, ALTDEUS: Beyond Chronos EPISODE YAMATO is finally out now!

It’s available for Oculus Quest / Oculus Quest 2 for $9.99 featuring English and Japanese voice acting and Chinese (Simplified), and French subtitles.

In the new DLC, ALTDEUS: Beyond Chronos EPISODE YAMATO, you play as Second Lieutenant Yamato Amanagi, a member of Prometheus and pilot of the Ares Makhia. The Swordstrike system, the awesome power of Ares Makhia's sword, provides you with new interactive experiences, taking approximately 2 hours to complete all of the story branches.

We’re pretty confident that the effects and the interactivity in the DLC are further enhanced from the main story’s.

We hope you’ll enjoy being Yamato!

Best regards,

The MyDearest Team

こんにちは！アルトデウスBC開発チームです！
この度はアルトデウスBCをプレイ頂きありがとうございます！

以前よりお伝えしていました新作DLC『アルトデウス：BC エピソード ヤマト』が6月11日に発売開始となりました！

本編にも登場したヤマト（CV.小林裕介）を主役に据えており、本編のエンディング「The Celestial Cradle」に大きく関連する内容となっています。“アレス・マキア”の武器であるソードによる戦いと決断が本DLCの大きな見どころになっています。

ヤマトが駆る対メテオラ用人型都市防衛兵器“アレス・マキア”を操縦して、もう一つのアルトデウスBCの物語を体験してみてください！

また、“アレス・マキア”に搭乗しているAARC（Artificial Augmented Reality Crystal人工拡張認識結晶）、アーク・アレス役の声優として岡本信彦さんが新たに出演しています！

DCLの価格は990円（税込）で、Oculus Quest、Oculus Quest2での先行配信となります！
アルトデウスBC本編をご購入頂いた方のみが購入可能となります！

皆さまからのプレイの感想を心よりお待ちしております！

引き続きご支援のほど、よろしくお願い致します！

アルトデウス開発チーム一同より

node.reviewDescription:
I saw this game when I was scrolling through the shop for the first time but didn’t get it till much later and I was so glad I did. I love the story, the characters and the way you unlock different parts of the story. 

It’s a great experience for the Oculus and now that more content is coming out I’m excited to come back and play this game some more

POST DLC UPDATE:
The DLC was great, the final part was awesome but the only downside I see is the dlc’s length. The story it contains is amazing I just wish there was more. Still this game continues to impress and amaze and I hope there will be more stuff coming for it in the future.
